summary_headlines_3: Rough weather ahead with storms likely
summary_headlines_4: Rain showers likely through the day
summary_headlines_5: Pack an umbrella â€” rain is on the way
summary_headlines_6: Expect a damp and drizzly forecast
summary_headlines_8: Cloudy and cool throughout the day
summary_headlines_11: Hot and blazing under clear skies
summary_headlines_12: Heat and sunshine dominate the forecast
summary_headlines_13: Bright and sunny â€” UV is high
summary_headlines_15: Clear skies with a UV warning
summary_headlines_20: Windy and brisk as the day begins
summary_headlines_21: Hold onto your hat â€” it's breezy
summary_headlines_24: Bundle up â€” it's brisk outside
summary_headlines_25: Pleasant and calm start to the day
summary_headlines_26: Fair weather to kick things off
summary_suffixes_6: expect gusts later in the day
precip_info: Rain amount describes how much rain is expected, typically given in millimeters (mm) or inches. It helps indicate the intensity of rainfall â€” from light showers to heavy downpours.
precip_info_2: Rain probability shows the chance of precipitation occurring at a given time and location, expressed as a percentage. For example, a 70% chance means rain is likely in that area.
precip_info_3: Rain duration indicates the total number of hours during the day that rain is expected. This helps estimate how long the weather might stay wet or overcast.
precip_info_4: Rain intensity measures how heavy the rain is during a given period, typically classified as light, moderate, or heavy. Heavier rainfall can lead to flooding or reduced visibility.
model_saved_snack: Model saved. Please refresh the weather
insights_sub_1: It's getting colder this week â€” temperatures drop by {tempDiff}Â° by the weekend.
insights_sub_2: Warming up ahead! Expect a rise of {tempDiff}Â° by the weekend.
insights_sub_3: Temperatures stay mostly stable this week.
insights_sub_4: High chance of rain mid-week â€” especially on {peakDay}.
insights_sub_5: Scattered showers possible on a few days this week.
insights_sub_6: Low rain chances all week â€” enjoy the dry spell!
insights_sub_7: Heatwave alert: {hotDays} days over {heatTemp}Â° are coming this week.
insights_sub_8: Expect a hot day or two â€” highs reaching {heatTemp}Â°.
insights_sub_9: No extreme heat expected this week.
insights_sub_10: It will feel stickier later this week as humidity climbs.
insights_sub_11: A drier air mass is moving in â€” humidity levels drop.
insights_sub_12: Humidity remains fairly consistent this week.
insights_sub_13: Windy conditions expected â€” especially on {weekdays}.
insights_sub_14: Breezy days ahead â€” nothing too wild though.
insights_sub_15: Calm winds for most of the week.
insights_sub_16: Pleasant week ahead â€” {sunnyDays} days of clear, comfortable weather!
insights_sub_17: Mixed skies this week, but still decent for outdoor plans.
insights_sub_18: Cloudy skies can trap heat overnight â€” warmer mornings ahead.
insights_sub_19: Wind chill can make {temp}Â° feel like {feelliketemp}Â° â€” dress accordingly.
insights_sub_20: A single thunderstorm can drop over 30 million gallons of water.
insights_sub_21: Sunlight can be more intense after a rainy day â€” wear sunscreen.
insights_sub_22: Big temperature swings expected today â€” dress in layers! ({tempdiff}Â°)
insights_sub_23: Temperatures stay fairly stable through the day.
insights_sub_24: High UV levels expected â€” especially around midday. Donâ€™t forget sunscreen!
insights_sub_25: Moderate UV levels today â€” still good to take precautions.
insights_sub_26: Low UV risk today â€” enjoy the outdoors!
insights_sub_27: Strong winds expected during certain hours â€” secure loose items outside.
insights_sub_28: Wind speeds will fluctuate a lot today â€” keep an extra layer handy.
insights_sub_29: Mostly calm winds throughout the day.
insights_sub_30: Humidity levels will vary significantly today â€” it may feel muggy at times.
insights_sub_31: Consistent humidity levels expected â€” comfortable air throughout the day.
insights_sub_32: Mostly cloudy skies for most of the day â€” limited sunshine.
insights_sub_33: Clear skies dominate â€” great day for outdoor activities!
insights_sub_34: Mixed clouds and sun throughout the day.
insights_sub_35: High chance of rain during some hours â€” keep an umbrella nearby!
insights_sub_36: Spotty rain showers possible during parts of the day.
insights_sub_37: Very low chance of rain in the next 24 hours.
model_disc_2: Global forecast by ECMWF, slightly lower resolution, highly reliable worldwide.
model_disc_3: High-resolution version of ECMWFâ€™s global model. Known for top accuracy globally.
model_disc_4: Chinese national model from CMA. Good for Asia-Pacific, less accurate globally.
model_disc_5: Global model from Australia's Bureau of Meteorology. Best for Australia & Oceania.
model_disc_6: Regional model optimized for Norway and Scandinavia. Very accurate for the Nordic region.
model_disc_7: NOAAâ€™s blended high-res + global forecast. Balanced accuracy with faster updates.
model_disc_8: NOAAâ€™s global model. Fast, free, decent worldwide but less precise locally.
model_disc_9: Ultra high-res short-range US model. Best for hyperlocal US forecasts (0â€“18h).
model_disc_10: AI-powered forecast by Google DeepMind. Experimental, smooth & cutting-edge globally.
model_disc_11: Blended Japan Meteorological Agency model. Accurate in Japan & East Asia.
model_disc_12: High-res short-range forecast for Japan. Great for 0â€“36h predictions in Japan.
model_disc_13: Japanâ€™s global forecast model. Lower res but reliable in Asia-Pacific.
model_disc_14: German Weather Serviceâ€™s blended ICON model. Good balance for Europe
model_disc_15: Global version of ICON. Precise forecasts worldwide, especially Europe.
model_disc_16: High-res regional ICON for Europe. Best for central & western Europe.
model_disc_17: Ultra high-res short-term forecast for Germany. Ideal for next 24â€“48h in DE.
model_disc_18: Environment Canadaâ€™s blended forecast. Good across North America.
model_disc_19: Canadaâ€™s global model. Reliable for global forecasts, better in northern latitudes.
model_disc_20: Canadian regional model. High detail for local areas in Canada.
model_disc_21: Ultra high-res Canadian model. Best for pinpoint weather in Canada & nearby US.
model_disc_22: Blended national model. Accurate in France & nearby countries.
model_disc_23: Global model from France. Decent worldwide, especially for French territories.
model_disc_24: Europe-focused ARPEGE. More precise than global version.
model_disc_25: High-res national model. Best for local French forecasts.
model_disc_27: High-resolution ICON model tailored by ARPAE for Italy. Ideal for detailed regional forecasts.
model_disc_28: Integrated multi-scale forecast system combining global and regional models for smooth transitions.
model_disc_29: Global model with 10km resolution. Suitable for medium-range international forecasts.
model_disc_30: High-resolution 2km model focused on the UK. Excellent for local short-term forecasting.
alerts_api_caution: Due to the API being in beta, alerts from other regions may occasionally appear
disable_battery_optimizations_sub: Disabling battery optimization is required for background updates to function properly
allow_notification_permission_sub: Permission is required for background app updates
summary_headlines_30: Expect some cloud cover later today
updates_in_the_background_sub: Allow background activity. Turning it off may stop widget updates
kmni_desc_1: Blended system integrating KNMI and ECMWF data for seamless global-to-local forecasts across scales
kmni_desc_2: High-resolution convection-permitting model covering Europe. Ideal for regional weather events and mesoscale features
kmni_desc_3: Ultra-high-resolution model focused on the Netherlands. Excellent for detailed local forecasts including precipitation and wind.
use_ai_for_summary_sub: GPT-4o Mini generates summaries of hourly, daily, and current weather, refreshing every 2 hours
background_updates_sub: Widget updates, update interval, and scheduled updates
new_version_snack_message: Show a snack message when a new version is released
insights_sub_38: The air will feel humid and sticky.
insights_sub_39: The air will feel comfortable and pleasant.
insights_sub_40: Expect dry and crisp air, very refreshing.
insights_sub_41: Very hot â€” light clothing is best.
insights_sub_42: Mild and warm â€” shorts or a t-shirt should be fine.
insights_sub_43: Cool weather â€” a jacket or sweater will help.
insights_sub_44: Cold conditions â€” bundle up with a coat.
insights_sub_45: Thick fog expected, with very low visibility.
insights_sub_46: Some mist or haze may reduce visibility at times.
insights_sub_47: Good visibility all day â€” clear conditions.
insights_sub_48: Extreme heat possible â€” may approach record highs.
insights_sub_49: Very cold weather expected â€” possibly record lows.
insights_sub_50: Temperatures are within the usual range â€” no records expected.
background_updates_not_working_sub: Some device vendors restrict apps in the background. Check dontkillmyapp.com for steps to fix this.
locations_gesture_info_1: Swipe from right to left to delete a location
locations_gesture_info_2: Hold a location to set it as default
condition_widget_animation_sub: Controls a transform animation. Disable this if you experience lag or freezing

best_match_full_best_for: Users unsure what model to pick
best_match_full_notes: Automatically selects the most appropriate model based on location and forecast range.
ECMWF_IFS_0.4Â°_full_countries: Fully global (no regional specialization; consistent performance worldwide)
ECMWF_IFS_0.4Â°_full_notes: Very reliable but lower spatial resolution than the 0.25Â° version. Great fallback model.
ECMWF_IFS_0.25Â°_full_notes: Arguably the most accurate public global model. Used by many national agencies. Slower updates than GFS.
CMA_GRAPES_Global_full_notes: Lower global reliability. Performs best around East Asia.
BOM_ACCESS_Global_full_notes: Tailored for Southern Hemisphere. High-quality over AU/Oceania.
MET_Norway_Nordic_full_best_for: Local precision for Norway, Sweden, Finland
MET_Norway_Nordic_full_notes: Uses MET Norwayâ€™s in-house regional models. Very accurate in Nordic terrain.
GFS_Seamless_full_notes: Combines GFS high-res short-term with long-range. Good balance between speed and reliability.
GFS_Global_full_notes: Slightly less accurate than ECMWF, but faster and more frequently updated.
GFS_HRRR__full_notes: Super high-res (3km). Best for storms, hourly planning, airport ops.
GFS_GraphCast_full_notes: DeepMindâ€™s AI forecast. Still experimental. Very good for visual consistency but not battle-tested yet.
JMA_Seamless_full_notes: National model with decent resolution. Blends short and long range.
JMA_MSM_full_notes: Very high resolution, excellent for metro areas like Tokyo or Osaka.
JMA_GSM_full_notes: Not as sharp as ECMWF or GFS, but stable in East Asia.
ICON_Seamless_full_notes: Transitions smoothly between resolutions. Good for large European areas.
ICON_Global_full_notes: Strong model globally. Among best for Germany and Central Europe.
ICON_EU_full_notes: High-res model. Great for terrain-rich regions.
ICON_D2_full_notes: Very detailed â€” cities, valleys, small regions.
GEM_Seamless_full_notes: Blended with HRDPS and regional models. Good balance.
GEM_Global_full_notes: Moderate global accuracy, optimized for polar areas.
GEM_Regional_full_notes: High-res version for populated areas like Toronto, Quebec, Vancouver.
GEM_HRDPS_Continental_full_notes: Very high-res (2.5km). Focused on precision forecasting.
MÃ©tÃ©o_France_Seamless_full_best_for: General use in France and nearby countries
MÃ©tÃ©o_France_Seamless_full_notes: Blended for smoother transitions. High confidence over France.
MÃ©tÃ©o_France_ARPEGE_France_HD_full_not: Excellent detail â€” rain, fog, wind, storm.
ItaliaMeteo_ARPAE_ICON_2I_full_notes: Based on ICON with ARPAE tuning. Strong for mountainous terrain.
UKMO_Seamless_full_notes: Smooth model transitions. Good for flights, sea, and national forecasts.
UKMO_Global_10km_full_notes: Strong global model. Good tropical performance.
UKMO_UK_2km_full_notes: One of the best models for dense urban UK settings.
KNMI_Seamless_with_ECMWF_full_notes: Combines KNMI short-range and ECMWF global models. Useful for aviation, marine, and national-level planning.
KNMI_Harmonie_Arome_Europe_full_best_for: Mesoscale weather features (e.g. thunderstorms, wind gusts)
KNMI_Harmonie_Arome_Europe_full_countrie: European countries including Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, France
KNMI_Harmonie_Arome_Europe_full_notes: Convection-permitting resolution. Very good for regional forecasting across European terrain.
KNMI_Harmonie_Arome_Netherlands_full_not: Ultra-fine resolution. Excellent for precipitation, wind, and local effects like sea breezes or fog.
